Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires screening incarcerated individuals for eligibility in the supplemental nutrition assistance program prior to release
Summary: Requires screening incarcerated individuals for eligibility in the supplemental nutrition assistance program prior to release and assistance in applying for such programs; requires officials to seek waivers from the USDA for eligibility for such program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to screening incarcerated individuals for eligibility in the supplemental nutrition assistance program prior to release
